title.value: Оценка агрономической и экономической эффективности удобрений при различной урожайности картофеля
Evaluation of agronomic and economic efficiency of fertilizers in case of different crop yield of potato
Evaluation of agronomic and economic efficiency of fertilizers in case of different crop yield of potato

journal.title: Agropanorama : scientific and technical journal for the agro-industrial complex workers

person.name: Safronovskaya, G.M., National Academy of Sciences. Scientific and Practical Center for Arable Farming (Belarus). Institute for Soil Science and Agrochemistry
Tsaruk, I.A., Belarus State Agrarian Technical Univ., Minsk (Belarus)

abstract.value: With the help of a standard method developed in Republican Scientific Subsidiary Unitary Enterprise 'Institute for Soil Science and Agrochemistry' calculated agronomic performance and economic efficiency of application of mineral and organic fertilizers in the cultivation of potatoes in the country. It is established that increase of fertilizers' application leads to the increment of the potato crop yield, provokes the increase of the return of the fertilizers due to positive crop yield response, causes economic growth and profitability increase. When potato yields over 301 kg per hectare payback of 1 kg of NPK increased up to 33.1-35.6 kg, 1 ton of organic fertilizers – up to 113.2-123.7 kg, while the profitability of organic and mineral fertilizers composes 152-256%.
